gardener_sign.description: Ein Schild mit der Markierung des Gärtners

mine_entrance_scaffold.description: Holzgerüst als Unterstützung für die Minen

potters_sign.description: Ein Schild mit der Markierung des Töpfers

berry_curtains.description: Du kannst fast die Beeren schmecken.

canopy_garden.description: Why just have flowers on the ground.

canopy_garden_long.description: Why just have flowers on the ground.

footman_tapestry.description: A detailed tapestry with the image of a foot soldier.

foxfire_lantern.description: Stone lantern filled with glowy goo

garden_bed.description: A sanctuary for all plant kind.

log_chair.description: Outdoor seating for moments of relaxation.

shepherd_tapestry.description: A tapestry of a shepherd and his sheep.

stone_garden_bed.description: A sanctuary for all plant kind.

tiered_stone_planter.description: Layer upon layer of organic goodness.

tiered_wooden_planter.description: Layer upon layer of organic goodness.

totem.description: A shrine to all aspects of life.

traveller_statue.description: Cold stone and deep dark eyes.

wall_mounted_foxfire_lantern.description: Wall Monted Stone lantern filled with glowy goo.

weaver_tapestry.description: A decorative tapestry of a weaver hard at work.

wise_man_statue.description: The quill is mightier than the sword.

wooden_hero_statue.description: What better way to honour our fallen heroes.

wooden_tree_planter.description: When little flowers just aren't enough.

foxfire_slime.description: A slimy substance that emits a blue glow

talisman.name: Gardener's Trowel
talisman.description: Promotes a citizen into a Gardener

job_description.description: The gardener creates decorative items from flowers
job_description.requirements: Gardener's trowel, crafted by the Blacksmith

level_data.l1_description: The gardener can now make a solid array of garden decorations.
level_data.l2_description: The gardener is now skillful enough to use more complex materials.
level_data.l3_description: When inspiration strikes, the gardener may embellish his works in unexpected ways.
level_data.l4_description: The gardener can create more ellaborate garden furniture.
level_data.l6_description: The gardener's mastery of his trade allows him to come up with completely new ways of using plants.

brightbell_hanging_basket.description: A basket for hanging brightbell flowers above your door.
brightbell_hanging_basket.flavor: Warning may become lethal during stormy weather.

canopy_garden_long.description: A long wooden frame covered in brightbell flowers.
canopy_garden_long.flavor: Something to look up at other than just clouds.

canopy_garden.description: A wooden frame covered in brightbell flowers.
canopy_garden.flavor: Something to look up at other than just clouds.

flower_fence.description: A decorative wooden fence, with brightbells woven through it.
flower_fence.flavor: Privacy and decoration, both in one package.

foxfire_hanging_basket.description: A basket for hanging foxfire above your door.
foxfire_hanging_basket.flavor: Warning may become lethal during stormy weather.

foxfire_slime.description: A slimy blue substance extracted from the inside of the foxfire plant.

frostsnap_hanging_basket.description: A basket for hanging frostsnap flowers above your door.
frostsnap_hanging_basket.flavor: Warning may become lethal during stormy weather.

garden_bed.description: A sanctuary of soil and organic goodness for a variety of plant species.

gardener_toolbench.description: The Gardeners Toolbench used for creating more complex garden decorations requireing more complex tools.

gardener_workbench.description: The Gardeners workbench for assembling various garden decorations.

large_stone_planter.description: A large stone oranment filled with flowers.

large_wooden_planter.description: A large wooden ornament filled with flowers.

potted_brightbell.description: A clay plant pot filled with Brightbells.

potted_foxfire.description: A clay plant pot filled with Foxfire.

potted_frostsnap.description: A clay plant pot filled with Frostsnaps.

potted_sunflower.description: A clay plant pot filled with Sunflowers.

scarecrow.description: A scarecrow to guard your crops.
scarecrow.flavor: Let's just hope this one doesn't come alive like the last one.

small_stone_planter.description: A small stone ornament, with brightbells within it.

small_wooden_planter.description: A small wooden ornament, with brightbells within it.

stone_garden_bed.description: A stone sanctuary of soil and organic goodness for a variety of plant species.

tiered_stone_planter.description: A stone planter with multiple tiers for the most elegant of gardens.

tiered_wooden_planter.description: A wooden planter with multiple tiers for the most elegant of gardens.

wooden_tree_planter.description: A large wooden planter filled with a small tree.
wooden_tree_planter.flavor: Don't you hate it when trees don't grow where you want them to.

picket_fence_archway_recipe.description: A decorative wooden archway for picket fence fields and gardens.
picket_fence_archway_recipe.flavor: Who has time to open gates.

robust_window.description: A sturdy window to stop intruders.

robust_door.description: A sturdy reliable door designed for secure accommodation.

mine_entrance_scaffold.flavor: In accordance with mine safety regulation 462-A.

gardener_sign.description: A sign with the mark of the gardener, to be placed on buildings.

the_mighty_worker_statue.description: A statue to inspire any worker into action.

wise_man_statue.description: A statue of a wise old man, honouring those who use brain over brawn.
wise_man_statue.flavor: So smart some say he was borderline crazy.

wooden_hero_statue.description: Honouring a mighty hero, who's act of bravery shall be remembered.
wooden_hero_statue.flavor: The Health & Safety department has decided we can't make the sword too pointy.

potters_sign.description: A sign with the mark of the potter, to be placed on buildings.
potters_sign.flavor: You break it you buy it.

spiked_fence_corner.description: Now you can make any angle you like, as long as its a 90 degree one.

bird_house.description: A little wooden home for your avian friends.

poster_bed.description: A large bed, for those who enjoy excessive levels of comfort.
poster_bed.flavor: Be the envy of all your neighbours.

fur_bed.description: Wrap up tight amongst layers of soft fur.
fur_bed.flavor: Now I know what a bear feels like.

log_chair.description: A chair carved from a log.
log_chair.flavor: Simple, cheap, effective and not at all comfy.

totem.description: A totem pole to show off your carpenters sculpting skills.

shelf.description: Provides elevated storage for books, ornaments and trophies...... if you had any.

foxfire_lantern.description: A stone crafted lantern filled with foxfire slime to light up the dark.

wall_mounted_foxfire_lantern.description: A stone crafted wall mounted lantern filled with foxfire slime to light up the dark.

sundial.description: A stone structure that uses light and shadow to show the time.

stone_totem.description: A stone totem with history and knowledge chisled upon it.

sarcophagus.description: A stone tomb that encases the body of a fallen hero.

stone_mine_entrance.description: Stone sclupted architecture to support mine entranceways.
stone_mine_entrance.flavor: In accordance with mine safety regulation 462-B.

carved_stone_window.description: Stone carved portal to the outside world.

fortress_window.description: Stone window secured with iron bars.

fortress_door.description: Stone framed with a reinforced double door.
fortress_door.flavor: Ideal counter for sieges and undead hordes!

stone_fur_bed.description: A strong stone base covered in soft fur.
stone_fur_bed.flavor: Without the fur this would be worse than a night on the floor.

luxury_stone_chair.description: A chair crafted from stone and padded with the softest fur.

guardian_statue.description: A stone crafted statue of a guardsman.
guardian_statue.flavor: Motionless and ever vigilant, just like a guard should be.

statue_of_fortune.description: A statue for providing gifts to the gods.
statue_of_fortune.flavor: Flower for hope, gold for fortune, iron for strength, bronze for protection.

traveller_statue.description: A statue in the likeness of the being said to lead the dead to the afterlife.

iron_gate.description: Stone pillars with an iron barred gate.

gardeners_tool.description: Promotes a hearthling into a Gardener.

skull_flag.description: A red flag mounted on a pole alongside 2 animal skulls.
skull_flag.flavor: If uncivilised barbaric horde is the look you're going for then this is the flag for you.

weaver_tapestry.description: A intricate tapestry depicting a weaver hard at work.

footman_tapestry.description: A detailed portrait of a foot soldier.

shepherd_tapestry.description: A tapestry of a Shepherd tending to his sheep.

flowered_curtains.description: Block out the harsh, cold realities of the outside world.

berry_curtains.description: Cotton curtains soaked in berry juice to give them a distinct purple colour.
berry_curtains.flavor: Inspired by the berry juice stains found all over villagers clothes.

straw_basket.description: A storage basket woven from straw, can store up to 16 items.

clay_brick_wall.description: A sturdy wall formed by stacking clay bricks.

small_vase.description: A small vase crafted from plain clay.

large_vase.description: A large vase crafted from plain clay.
